Uses of Interface
maze.MazeBuilder

  • Packages that use MazeBuilder 
    Package Description
    maze  

    • Uses of MazeBuilder in maze

      Methods in maze that return MazeBuilder 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      MazeBuilder MazeBuilder.addOneWayPassage​(Room fromRoom, Room toRoom)
      Creates a passage from fromRoom to toRoom such that toRoom is added to the ListInterface returned by fromRoom's Room.getRooms() method.
      MazeBuilder MazeBuilder.addPassage​(Room room0, Room room1)
      Creates a passage between room0 and room1 such that room1 is added to the ListInterface returned by room0's Room.getRooms() method and room0 is added to the ListInterface returned by room1's Room.getRooms() method.
